languages.text: "Домин'{name}, цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега. Хорошо, что ты здесь — с ней. Правильно. Неумирающий благословил света и тени союз".

traits.locale_text: "Эним'{name}, цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега. И ты сегодня подле Второго ткача. Не ради дел своих — но ради нее. Воистину Неумирающий благословил света и тени союз".

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name}, цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега. Хорошо, что ты здесь — с ней. Правильно. Неумирающий благословил света и тени союз".

traits.locale_text: "Enim'{name}, {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. That is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."
"Enim'{name}, {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. That is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."
"Domin'{name}, {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."
"Domin'{name}, {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."
"Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."
"Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."

languages.text: « Domin'{name}, {mf|seigneur|maîtresse} de l'Arche. C'est une bonne chose que vous soyez ici avec elle. L'Immortel a béni cette union de la lumière et de l'ombre, et ainsi, Sa volonté est faite. »
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."

traits.locale_text: « Domin'{name}, {mf|seigneur|maîtresse} de l'Arche. C'est une bonne chose que vous soyez ici avec elle. L'Immortel a béni cette union de la lumière et de l'ombre, et ainsi, Sa volonté est faite. »

languages.text: «Domin'{name}, l{mf|ord|ady} del Arca. Qué bien que esté aquí con ella. Es lo mejor. El Inmortal bendice esta unión de luces y sombras».
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name}, l{mf|ord|ady} del Arca. Qué bien que esté aquí con ella. Es lo mejor. El Inmortal bendice esta unión de luces y sombras».

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}、方舟の{mf|君|方}よ。彼女と共にここにいてくれてよかった。それが望ましい。不死の者はこの光と影の団結を祝福しています」
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・{name}、方舟の{mf|君|方}よ。彼女と共にここにいてくれてよかった。それが望ましい。不死の者はこの光と影の団結を祝福しています」

languages.text: “秘者{name}，方舟之主，很高兴您能在这里陪着她。这是正确的安排，不死之神为光与影的结合降下了祝福。”
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}，方舟之主，很高兴您能在这里陪着她。这是正确的安排，不死之神为光与影的结合降下了祝福。”

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} der Arche. Es ist gut, dass Ihr mit ihr hier seid. Es ist richtig. Der Todlose hat diese Union von Licht und Schatten gesegnet."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} der Arche. Es ist gut, dass Ihr mit ihr hier seid. Es ist richtig. Der Todlose hat diese Union von Licht und Schatten gesegnet."

languages.text: "Ark'ın {mf|Lordu|Leydisi} Domin'{name}. Kibellah'nın yanında olduğunuzu görmek ne güzel. Doğru olan da bu. Işığın ve gölgenin bu birliği, Ölmeyen tarafından kutsandı."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. It is good that you are here with her. It is right. The Undying One has blessed this union of light and shadow."
